description: When a little snow and wind has your friends canceling their workouts, pull on the Men’s ROM GORE-TEX® Infinium Pants and get out there. These are the ultimate go-fast or climb-high pants for high-output activities where you need protection from the elements and the terrain but can’t sacrifice breathability. Scuff guards in high abrasion zones will do the trick when you're conquering a new pitch. Did we mention they are designed to comfortably fit with a harness? Your crag crew will be jealous.
name: Marmot ROM GTX Infinium Pants - Mens
